TopicTitle: Please recommend Mods that supply new and interestingly shaped Command pods

Articles.Content:
I'm somewhat bored with the stock command pods and would love to play with something different. Especially if has strange or non-traditional shape.

I've tried LazTek's Dragons pods and love HGR's Soyuz like pods. What else would you recommend? No Shuttle's please!
This should probably go in add on requests, but FASA has historical command pods (mercury, Gemini, Apollo)
Does FASA have a working Lunar Module?! 'cause that would be mind blowingly sweet!

Does FASA have a working Lunar Module?! 'cause that would be mind blowingly sweet!

It has a complete replica of the entire Saturn V, including the LEM.

Near Future Spacecraft. The Mk3-9 is a beautiful pod, similar to the Mk1-2 but much more advanced. Then the PPD-1 is a 3.75m heavy command pod, with an interesting shape.

The Taurus HCV is another 3.75m pod, and comes with a bunch of little accessories. There's a modder working on a nice 2.5m stock-like Dragon, though it hasn't been released yet- Tundra Space Industries I think it's called. Tantares has some cool stock-like Soyuz pods. Stockalike Station Parts Expansion has a few different sized cupola modules, and they're very well done. I can't think of any others, but I believe there are some crazy sci-fi mods out there if you want some really unique pods.

NearFuture has also some nice command pods (big ones) along with everything else it offers.

Near Future Spacecraft imgur album here.

Check out transparent command pods

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84054

They offer great field of view in iva.

KOSMOS. It has an interesting capsule based on TKS design.

There is also the original Mk1 on curse.com now.

B9 Aerospace has pretty good looking command pods, but I think they won't go well together with stock fuel tanks requiring their own. Haven't tried it though, so not sure if true

NovaPunch also adds couple cockpits.

Edited October 12, 2014 by Las-pen
